courseName: Data Science for Health and Social Care (Online Learning)
description: Programme descriptionData is revolutionising the way health and social care is delivered.The demand for health and social care professionals with data science skills is unprecedented.This flexible online programme is aimed at:people working in health or social care or computational roles who are interested in starting a career in data sciencegraduates who are seeking to develop data science skills that can be applied in health, social and care servicesWhat you will learnBy studying the degree you will:
